name: IOUserAudioSelectorControl
desc: A control object that supports selecting from a set of values.

items.name: + Create
items.desc: Allocates and initializes an instance of the selector control class.

items.name: - init
items.desc: Initializes an instance of a selector control.

items.name: - GetClassID
items.desc: Gets the audio class identifier of the object.

items.name: - GetBaseClassID
items.desc: Gets the audio class identifier of the base class object.

items.name: - HandleChangeSelectedValues
items.desc: Tells the selection control the value is changing.

items.name: - SetCurrentSelectedValues
items.desc: Sets the current selections of the selector.

items.name: - GetCurrentSelectedValues
items.desc: Gets the current selections of the selector.

items.name: - GetControlValuesCount
items.desc: Gets the number of available selector values.

items.name: - AddControlValueDescriptions
items.desc: Add value descriptions to the selector control.

items.name: - RemoveControlValueDescriptions
items.desc: Removes value descriptions from the selector control.

items.name: - GetControlValueDescriptions
items.desc: Gets value descriptions used by the selector control.
